function.name: AddExperience
function.DescriptionEN: Adds experience to this unit.
function.DescriptionCN: 给单位增加经验值

HowToCall.Parameter: amount：经验值，applyBotDifficultyScaling：应用机器人难度修正

function.name: Buyback
function.DescriptionEN: Spend the gold and buyback with this hero.
function.DescriptionCN: 花费金钱并买活英雄

function.name: CalculateStatBonus
function.DescriptionEN: Recalculate all stats after the hero gains stats.
function.DescriptionCN: 英雄返回属性后，重新计算全部属性

function.name: CanEarnGold
function.DescriptionEN: Returns boolean value result of buyback gold limit time less than game time.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回布尔值，买活返回金钱限制时间是否少于游戏时间（其实就是是否能够正常返回金钱.....）

function.name: ClearLastHitMultikill
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: ClearLastHitStreak
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: ClearStreak
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: GetAbilityPoints
function.DescriptionEN: Gets the current unspent ability point's.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回未分配的技能点数

function.name: GetAgility
function.DescriptionCN: 返回敏捷值

function.name: GetAgilityGain
function.DescriptionCN: 返回敏捷成长

function.name: GetAssists
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回助攻数，数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: GetBaseAgility
function.DescriptionCN: 返回基础敏捷

function.name: GetBaseDamageMax
function.DescriptionEN: Hero damage is also affected by attributes.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回基础攻击伤害最大值，英雄的基础攻击伤害也会受到属性影响

function.name: GetBaseDamageMin
function.DescriptionEN: Hero damage is also affected by attributes.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回基础攻击伤害最小值，英雄的基础攻击伤害也会受到属性影响

function.name: GetBaseIntellect
function.DescriptionCN: 返回基础智力

function.name: GetBaseStrength
function.DescriptionCN: 返回基础力量

function.name: GetBonusDamageFromPrimaryStat
function.DescriptionCN: 返回来自主属性奖励的攻击伤害值

function.name: GetBuybackCooldownTime()
function.DescriptionEN: Return float value for the amount of time left on cooldown for this hero's buyback.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回该英雄买活CD的剩余时间

function.name: GetBuybackCost()
function.DescriptionEN: Return integer value for the gold cost of a buyback.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回买活所需金钱

function.name: GetBuybackGoldLimitTime
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the amount of time gold gain is limited after buying back.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回买活所带来的金钱惩罚剩余时间

function.name: GetCurrentXP
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the amount of XP
function.DescriptionCN: 返回当前经验值

function.name: GetDeathGoldCost
function.DescriptionCN: 返回死亡损失金钱

function.name: GetDeaths
function.DescriptionCN: 返回死亡次数

function.name: GetDenies
function.DescriptionCN: 返回反补次数

function.name: GetGold
function.DescriptionEN: Returns gold amount for the player owning this hero
function.DescriptionCN: 返回该英雄拥有者所有的金钱数量

function.name: GetHealthRegen
function.DescriptionEN: Hero health regen is affected by attributes.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回每秒生命回复，英雄生命回复受到属性影响

function.name: GetIncreasedAttackSpeed
function.DescriptionEN: Hero attack speed is also affected by agility.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回攻击速度增加值（IAS），英雄攻击速度受到敏捷影响

function.name: GetIntellect
function.DescriptionCN: 返回智力值

function.name: GetIntellectGain
function.DescriptionCN: 返回智力成长

function.name: GetKills
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回击杀数，数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: GetLastHits
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回正补数，数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: GetManaRegen
function.DescriptionEN: Hero mana regen is affected by attributes.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回每秒魔法回复，英雄魔法回复受到属性影响

function.name: GetMostRecentDamageTime
function.DescriptionCN: 返回最近一次伤害时间

function.name: GetMultipleKillCount
function.DescriptionCN: 返回多杀计数

function.name: GetPhysicalArmorValue
function.DescriptionEN: Hero armor is affected by attributes.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回护甲值，英雄护甲受到属性影响

function.name: GetPlayerID
function.DescriptionEN: Returns player ID of the player owning this hero
function.DescriptionCN: 返回英雄拥有者的ID

function.name: GetPrimaryAttribute
function.DescriptionEN: 0 = strength, 1 = agility, 2 = intelligence.
function.DescriptionCN: 返回英雄主要属性，0 = 力量, 1 = 敏捷, 2 = 智力.

HowToCall.Return: int：0 = 力量, 1 = 敏捷, 2 = 智力

function.name: GetPrimaryStatValue
function.DescriptionCN: 返回主属性值

function.name: GetRespawnTime
function.DescriptionCN: 返回复活时间

function.name: GetStatsBasedManaRegen
function.DescriptionCN: 返回属性提供的魔法回复

function.name: int GetStreak()
function.DescriptionCN: 返回连杀数

function.name: GetStrength
function.DescriptionCN: 返回力量值

function.name: GetStrengthGain
function.DescriptionCN: 返回力量成长

function.name: GetTimeUntilRespawn
function.DescriptionCN: 返回复活所需的时间

function.name: HasAnyAvailableInventorySpace
function.DescriptionCN: 返回是否有可用物品栏空间

function.name: HasFlyingVision
function.DescriptionCN: 返回是否拥有空中视野

function.name: HasRoomForItem
function.signature: int HasRoomForItem(string a, bool b, bool c)
function.DescriptionEN: Args: const char* pItemName, bool bIncludeStashCombines, bool bAllowSelling
function.DescriptionCN: 参数: const char* pItemName, bool bIncludeStashCombines, bool bAllowSelling

HowToCall.Parameter: a：道具名，b：包括配方，c：允许出售

function.name: HeroLevelUp
function.DescriptionEN: Levels up the hero, true or false to play effects.
function.DescriptionCN: 升级英雄, 参数决定是否播放升级效果.

function.name: IncrementAssists
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementDeaths
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementDenies
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementKills
function.DescriptionEN: Passed ID is for the victim, killer ID is ID of the current hero. Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 增加击杀数，击杀者为当前英雄，传入ID为受害者ID。数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: void IncrementLastHitMultikill()
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementLastHits()
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementLastHitStreak
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementNearbyCreepDeaths()
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IncrementStreak
function.DescriptionEN: Value is stored in PlayerResource.
function.DescriptionCN: 数值存储在玩家资源(PlayerResource)中

function.name: IsBuybackDisabledByReapersScythe
function.DescriptionCN: 是否被死神镰刀禁止买活

function.name: IsReincarnating
function.DescriptionCN: 是否处于重生中

function.name: KilledHero
function.DescriptionEN: Args: Hero, Inflictor
function.DescriptionCN: 参数: 英雄, 加害者

function.name: ModifyAgility
function.DescriptionEN: Adds passed value to base attribute value, then calls CalculateStatBonus.
function.DescriptionCN: 增加指定值到英雄基础敏捷，随后调用CalculateStatBonus

function.name: ModifyGold
function.signature: int ModifyGold(int goldAmmt, bool reliable, int reason)
function.DescriptionEN: Gives this hero some gold. Args: int nGoldChange, bool bReliable, int reason
function.DescriptionCN: 给予英雄金钱。参数: int 金钱数, bool 是否为可靠金钱, int 原因

HowToCall.Parameter: goldAmmt：金钱数，reliable：是否为可靠金钱，reason：原因

function.name: ModifyIntellect
function.DescriptionEN: Adds passed value to base attribute value, then calls CalculateStatBonus.
function.DescriptionCN: 增加指定值到英雄基础智力，随后调用CalculateStatBonus

function.name: ModifyStrength
function.DescriptionEN: Adds passed value to base attribute value, then calls CalculateStatBonus.
function.DescriptionCN: 增加指定值到英雄基础力量，随后调用CalculateStatBonus

function.name: RespawnHero
function.signature: void RespawnHero(bool buyback, bool unknown1, bool unknown2)

function.name: SetAbilityPoints
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the current unspent ability point's.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置当前可用技能点

function.name: SetBaseAgility
function.DescriptionCN: 设置基础敏捷

function.name: SetBaseIntellect
function.DescriptionCN: 设置基础智力

function.name: SetBaseStrength
function.DescriptionCN: 设置基础力量

function.name: SetBuybackCooldownTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the buyback cooldown time.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置买活冷却时间

function.name: SetBuyBackDisabledByReapersScythe
function.DescriptionCN: 设置是否被死神镰刀禁止买活

function.name: SetBuybackGoldLimitTime
function.DescriptionEN: Set the amount of time gold gain is limited after buying back.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置买活后金钱惩罚时间

function.name: SetCustomDeathXP
function.DescriptionEN: Sets a custom experience value for this hero. Tip: GameRules boolean must be set for this to work!
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该英雄死亡提供的经验值 Tip: 需要设置GameRules!

function.name: SetGold
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the gold amount for the player owning this hero
function.DescriptionCN: 设置英雄拥有者的金钱

HowToCall.Parameter: amount：整数数值，reliableGold：是否可靠金钱

HowToCall.PS: 设置复活还需要的时间

function.name: SpendGold
function.DescriptionEN: Args: int nGold, int nReason
function.DescriptionCN: 参数: int 金钱, int 原因

function.name: UpgradeAbility
function.DescriptionEN: This upgrades the passed ability if it exists and the hero has enough ability point's.
function.DescriptionCN: 升级指定技能，需要英雄拥有该技能和技能点
